com.jgoodies.binding.binder

Class ActionBindingBuilderImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jgoodies.binding.binder.ActionBindingBuilderImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ActionBindingBuilder
    Deprecated. 
    Replaced by the event handler classes in the JGoodies Smart Client's Sandbox

    @Deprecated
public class ActionBindingBuilderImpl
extends Object
implements ActionBindingBuilder
    Holds an Action that can be bound to buttons and text fields.
    Since:
    2.3
    Author:
    Karsten Lentzsch
